#:pisocorral $7F2B004 $CD5AB6E5 $9B708306 $185CDB6 $6C907E76 $38C2B6E6 0

 #lugarl 100

:entra
	inigui
	'exit >esc<
	$b45d31 paper
	show clrscr
		1.0 dup fdim 0 dup fpos
		'pisocorral sprite
		'gallinero sprite

		-0.2 0.2 fdim  -0.5 0.2 fpos  'gallina1 sprite
		0.4 dup fpos 0.3 dup fdim
		blink 1? ( 'gallina1 )( 'gallina2 ) nip
		dup sprite
		0.7 -0.3 fpos -0.25 0.25 fdim
		sprite
		;

: entra ;
